DOC.detailed_description: Indication study : IgE mediate allergic disorder trigger grass pollen . Number centre : approximately 50 . Study period plan : Q2-2006 Q3-2008 Analysis one expose season ( 2007 ) ; base outcome study stop continue another season . Subject selection criterion : Seasonal rhinitis and/or rhinoconjunctivitis without mild asthma ( FEV1 > 70 % ) related grass pollen , age 12 year old . Dosage schedule : Start two drop daily SUBLIVAC® increase two drops daily , maintenance dose 10 drop SUBLIVAC® GrassesSUBLIVAC® Grasses reach . Route administration : Sublingual application ( drops hold underneath tongue 2-3 minute swallow ) . Duration treatment : 6 12 month blind per subject . Efficacy parameter
